snippet: Also, the new chief executive of Sony promises "difficult decisions" to revive the company, and Ann Romney starts a Twitter account to respond to comments from a Democratic strategist.
abstract: Also, the new chief executive of Sony promises "difficult decisions" to revive the company, and Ann Romney starts a Twitter account to respond to comments from a Democratic strategist.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Scrutiny for E-Book Pricing, and Phone-Hacking Lawsuits in U.S.
